result.arabic_text: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَذۡهَبَ عَنَّا ٱلۡحَزَنَۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٞ شَكُورٌ
result.translation: 36.Kaadu koroosite marah tu-gactek jahannam girá Ion, raboonuh rabi keenil ma-meklimaay, tet digaalák- tu keenil ma-xabbacoysinta (salacta). Ummaan korostay koroosannut caddok tature tonnah tan galtóh galatna.
